question: Nowadays, the use of animal testing in medical research has become a hot topic. Some people believe that animal testing should be banned, whereas others claim it is necessary. Discuss both views and give your opinion
text: It is argued by many that animal testing should be banned . However , there is another group of folks who actually supports this fact and want it to be continued, stating this as a crucial part of new discoveries.

To begin with , the people from the first group have the perception that the species may get extinct . The continuous usage of living creatures can push them towards the situation, where they can come to the edge of extinction . For ,example enormous  white rats were used in medical experiments that resulted in a big drop in the population of white rats .

Individuals worship mammals as they have spiritual beliefs towards the flora and fauna . Thus, they hold the perception that we should worship these species and take care of them  in every possible way . For ,instance rat is lord Ganesha's best friend so humans take blessings from rats for their well being .

Though the points highlighted by the folks from the first group are valid , however only to some extent .It is preposterous to completely go against examining  the results on species . Humans cannot go ahead with the usage of any medicine until and unless it has been analysed in every possible manner . To have accuracy in the research done by humans , studying the effects on different brings plays a vital role . The unforgettable incident that happened in the health care centre, Banglore in 2004 add weightage to this fact . The medicines were given to infants without studying the side effects and therefore resulted in mass death cases.

At last but not least we get to know a lot more about the hidden qualities of the mammals if they go through the process of being kept under observation . This statement recalls me of the scenario where , when mammals were tested with antibiotics to study that to what extent the antibiotics can make the blood thick . This complete process at the end concluded that the mammals can secret a type of oil that can treat the BP patience.

I am personally in favour of researching the side effects by doing experiments on creatures . The ecosystem has made this law for the survival of  one creature, the others will have  to bear the cost . As we rely on plants as well for food and harvest them so is the case of animals , we use them for commercial purposes for our benefit. So I believe that one must accept the fact that the usage of animals in experiments is no big concern to worry about .

To sum up , we all must accept the law of nature and just go with the flow . To compensate the flora and fauna for the beneficial properties we take from them. We can make efforts to protect them and provide better living , rather than completely standing against the process of using them for our growth.
